Class BaseAdornerServerResource

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CorpusConfigResource, GapFillerResource, HyphenatorResource, LanguageRecognizerResource, LemmatizerResource, LexiconLookupResource, NameRecognizerResource, ParserResource, PartOfSpeechTaggerResource, PluralizerResource, SentenceSplitterResource, SpellingStandardizerResource, SummarizerResource, SyllableCounterResource, TEIAdornedToSentencesResource, TEIAdornedToTabularFileResource, TEIAdornerResource, TEIApplyChangesToAdornedFileResource, TEICompareAdornedFilesResource, TEINotesMoverResource, TEIToTextResource, TEIUnadornerResource, TextSegmenterResource, ThesaurusResource, VerbConjugatorResource, VersionResource, WordTokenizerResource

    public class BaseAdornerServerResource
extends org.restlet.ext.wadl.WadlServerResource
    Base server resource class providing common methods shared by MorphAdorner server resources.

      • createHtmlRepresentation

        protected org.restlet.representation.Representation createHtmlRepresentation(org.restlet.ext.wadl.ApplicationInfo applicationInfo)
        Creates a new HTML representation for a given WadlServerResource instance describing a server resource.

        The created WadlRepresentation.
